column5: Business Analytics, which is shaping today’s businesses in dramatic ways, is the process of gathering, analysing and making business decisions from big data, the vast amount of data now widely available. Businesses today use analytics to inform strategy, gain competitive advantage, and improve business decision making. Analysing such data can help improve efficiency, reduce costs, improve asset use, provide real-time logistics management and much more.
column7: Home - Full-time - £11550 per year Home - Part-time - £5775 per year International - Full-time - £15450 per year
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
